existing_features.title: Adjust the right-to-left track title marquee motion so it feels slightly less aggressive: make the default scroll a bit slower and introduce a subtle pause at the loop boundary (end/start) while keeping the scroll itself smooth and continuous during movement.

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust the right-to-left marquee motion (tweak speed/feel) based on user feedback

projectName: Tweak right-to-left marquee motion (speed/feel) for track title
